Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent to which House Democrats are keeping Republicans out of the impeachment inquiry.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that transcripts of witness remarks have been obtained by news outlets.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the impeachment inquiry doesn't feature the opposition party or cross-examination.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the lack of cross-examination and the exclusion of the opposition party is a biased action.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider alternative explanations for why some Republicans have been excluded from the hearings, such as not being on the relevant committees or choosing not to attend.
